business.headline: Nirmala Sitharaman dismisses tax relief link with Delhi electionFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman dismissed speculation that the government increased the tax relief to Rs 12 lakh due to the upcoming Delhi elections.
No plans to shut it down: Nirmala Sitharaman on old tax regimeFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman table the Union Budget 2025 on February 1, 2025.

Respecting service of taxpayers: Nirmala Sitharaman on Budget income tax breaks Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharman said that the tax relief given in Budget 2025 was Prime Minister Narendar Modi's effort to respect the service the taxpayers are doing for nation building.

5 key tax reforms for middle class introduced in Budget 2025 Union Budget 2025: The new tax structure announced in the Union Budget 2025 aims to ease the financial burden of the middle class, enhancing their disposable income and giving a boost to their consumption levels.
Consumption vs capex: Has the government prioritised spending over growth?Budget 2025 provided tax relief for taxpayers, but the government also maintained its fiscal deficit target at 4.4% of GDP.

Budget 2025: What's in it for farmers, agriculture and rural businesses?Budget 2025 aims to modernise India's agricultural landscape and reinforces the government's commitment to sustainable agriculture and farmer empowerment.

Sensex jumps over 1,000 points: 3 reasons why stock market is rising todayAt 1:34 PM, the S&P BSE Sensex was up 981.63 points at 77,918.17, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 286.90 points to trade at 23,647.95.
Sensex, Nifty rebound after sharp fall after global trade concerns easeThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 522.62 points to 77,709.36, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 142.15 points to 23,503.20 as of 9:30 AM.

Will PF deposit interest rate go up? EPFO board to meet on February 28The Central Board of Trustees (CBT), which is led by the Union Minister for Labour and Employment, is the top decision-making body of the (Employees Provident Fund Organisation) EPFO.
Trade war fears spook markets: Sensex, Nifty take a hit as rupee weakensThe S&P BSE Sensex tanked by 319.22 points to end at 77,186.74, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 128.85 points to close at 23,353.30.

Explained: Why Volkswagen has sued Indian authoritiesAccording to the government, Volkswagen broke down imports of some VW, Skoda, and Audi cars into separate components, instead of declaring them as completely knocked down (CKD) units.
India reviewing crypto stance amid global policy shift: ReportIndians have poured money into cryptocurrencies in recent years despite the country's tough regulatory stance and steep trading taxes.

Earn over Rs 12.75 lakh? You can still pay zero tax under new regimeWith a standard deduction of Rs 75,000 under the new regime, salaried taxpayers earning up to Rs 12.75 lakh annually do not need to pay any tax. But what if you have a higher annual income, say Rs 13 lakh or more? You could still end up paying no tax.

New income tax slabs: Check how much you'll save with these simple calculationsBudget 2025: Tax experts explain how the new income tax changes impact taxpayers across income levels, from Rs 6 lakh to Rs 1 crore, after the fresh proposals in the Union Budget 2025.

Volkswagen sues Indian authorities over $1.4 billion tax notice: ReportThe tax dispute began in September 2024, when Indian authorities issued a $1.4 billion tax notice to Volkswagen's Skoda Auto Volkswagen India unit.

Explained: Why rupee fell past 87 against US dollar to a record lowThe Indian rupee (INR) dropped to an all-time low of Rs 87.1450 per dollar, down 0.6% from Friday. It may be noted that the rupee has fallen almost 4% since October 2024.
Sensex tanks 700 points: Why is the stock market falling today?Stock market crash: Sensex plunged over 700 points and Nifty lost nearly 300 points in early trade.

Rupee hits an all-time low to go past Rs 87 against US dollar. Here's why Rupee hit an all-time low, breaching 87 per US dollar for the first time. The sharp fall was mainly triggered by three executive orders signed by Trump over the weekend.

Markets in red: Sensex drops 500 points, rupee hits record lowShare Market Today: The S&P BSE Sensex plunged 516.30 points to 76,989.66, while the NSE Nifty50 fell by 230.90 points to 23,251.25 as of 9:25 AM.

Stock market today: Will Sensex, Nifty rally after Budget 2025? Stocks to buyShare Market Today: Market experts believe that while the budget had some positive aspects, certain key areas did not meet expectations.

entertainment.headline: Sarah Michelle Gellar to star in Buffy the Vampire Slayer sequel: ReportActor Sarah Michelle Gellar will reportedly be reprising her role as Buffy Summers for Buffy the Vampire Slayer's sequel on Hulu. Chloe Zhao is in talks to direct the show.

Game Changer OTT release: When and where to watch Ram Charan-Kiara Advani filmRam Charan's Game Changer OTT release date: Shankar's telugu directorial, Game Changer, is all set to stream on OTT soon. Read details about when and where you can watch the Ram Charan and Kiara Advani-starrer on OTT.

Karisma Kapoor recreates Hum Saath Saath Hain scene with Badshah on Indian Idol 15Actors Karisma Kapoor, Mohnish Behl and filmmaker Sooraj Barjatya were among the special guests on Indian Idol 15. During their appearance, Karisma recreated one of her iconic scenes from Hum Saath Saath Hain with Badshah.

Dining With The Kapoors: Kareena, Ranbir, and family bond over food and filmsThe entire Kapoor Khandaan including Kareena Kapoor, Ranbir Kapoor, Karisma Kapoor, and others have united for a Netflix special film, Dining With the Kapoors. The project was announced as a part of the Netflix 2025 slate.
Did Samay Raina joke about Rekha on Amitabh Bachchan's KBC 16? Here's the truthA viral video shows Samay Raina joking about Rekha with Amitabh Bachchan on KBC 16, but it appears to be doctored.

Pics: Sonu Nigam performs at Rashtrapati Bhavan after suffering back painSonu Nigam performed at Rashtrapati Bhavan despite suffering from a severe back spasm just a day back. The singer performed on the occasion of Rashtrapati Bhavan Diwas.

Associated Press apologises to Babyface for cutting short Grammy interviewAP apologised to 12-time Grammy-winning composer Babyface after cutting his interview short on the Grammys red carpet. Stars like Khloé Kardashian criticised the journalists for disrespecting the music legend.

SRK jokes about being 'Naam ka producer' at son Aryan's directorial launchShah Rukh Khan launched his son, Aryan Khan's directorial debut project, The Ba***ds of Bollywood, on February 3. During the Netflix event, the actor referred to himself as 'naam ka producer'.

The Ba***ds of Bollywood: SRK launches son Aryan Khan's directorial debut Shah Rukh Khan launched the upcoming project, The Ba***ds of Bollywood, which marks the directorial debut of his son, Aryan Khan. The actor unveiled the announcement video during the Netflix 2025 event.

Test teaser: R Madhavan, Nayanthara and Siddharth set for 'test of life'The teaser of TEST, starring R Madhavan, Nayanthara and Siddharth was unveiled on Monday. The upcoming cricket drama will stream on Netflix this year.

The Royals teaser: Zeenat Aman makes a comeback in Ishaan, Bhumi's royal love storyThe teaser of Ishaan Khatter and Bhumi Pednekar's The Royals is finally out. Set to stream on Netflix, the upcoming drama also stars Zeenat Aman, Sakshi Tanwar and Milind Soman in key roles.

The Tale of Lady Ok review: Lim Ji-yeon stars in a standout historical K-dramaReleased-Mon Jan 06, 2025Unlike most Joseon-era dramas that revolve around kings, queens, and court politics, The Tale of Lady Ok dares to step outside the palace. Read on.

Khakee The Bengal Chapter teaser: Neeraj Pandey promises darker, grittier sagaFilmmaker Neeraj Pandey's Khakee The Bengal Chapter was unveiled at the Netflix event today, February 3. The upcoming series will feature Prosenjit Chatterjee, Saswata Chatterjee, Parambrata Chatterjee, and others in key roles.

Akka teaser: Keerthy Suresh, Radhika Apte fight for supreme power in YRF's showNetflix unveiled the first look teaser of its highly-anticipated period thriller drama, Akka. It stars Radhika Apte and Keerthy Suresh in indomitable avatars.

Ishq Mein song from Nadaaniyan: Ibrahim and Khushi bring their A-game in romanceThe team of Nadaaniyan released the first song from the film on Monday. The Netflix romantic drama marks the debut of Ibrahim Ali Khan with Khushi Kapoor.

Kohhra 2 teaser: Barun Sobti leads a 'smooth and silky' but intense sequelBarun Sobti and Mona Singh feature in the sequel to Kohhra on Netflix. The teaser of the series promises an intense and mysterious experience by director Sudip Sharma and Faisal Rahman.

Aap Jaisa Koi teaser: R Madhavan, Fatima in a heartwarming tale of love, laughterActors R Madhavan and Fatima Sana Shaikh are all set to share screen space in the upcoming drama, Aap Jaisa Koi, on Netflix. The streaming giant shared the teaser on February 3.

Rana Naidu 2 teaser: Arjun Rampal joins Rana Daggubati, Venkatesh in tricky face-offThe teaser of the much-awaited Rana Naidu 2 was unveiled at a grand event on Monday. The second installment features a stellar cast of Venkatesh Daggubati, Rana Daggubati, Surveen Chawla and Arjun Rampal.

Delhi Crime 3 teaser: Shefali Shah returns as Madam Sir to tackle child traffickingActor Shefali Shah-starrer Delhi Crime 3 was announced at the Netflix event on February 3. The streaming giant dropped the teaser of the upcoming gripping drama.
Pics: Saif Ali Khan, R Madhavan, Shefali Shah, and others at Netflix event Several Bollywood stars gathered as Netflix India unveiled its 2025 slate on February 3. Take a look at the pictures here.

'Pressure tactics': AAP vs poll body after case against Atishi day before electionDelhi Election: Joining Atishi's tirade against the central poll body, AAP supremo Arvind Kejriwal said that anyone who raises their voice against BJP's "hooliganism" will be targeted by Delhi Police and the Election Commission.

Trump begins mass deportation: How many Indians will be impacted?A US military aircraft carrying 205 Indian nationals departed from Texas for Amritsar on Tuesday as part of Trump's mass deportation plan.

Blue Ghost captures stunning video that will make flat-earthers cringeLaunched on January 15, 2025, Blue Ghost has already demonstrated remarkable precision in its trajectory, allowing it to skip a planned third Earth orbit manoeuvre.

Kejriwal is preferred Delhi CM by a mile, but is that enough?The latest C Voter survey in the aftermath of the Union Budget reveals that a near certain victory for the Aam Aadmi Party is becoming a knife-edge contest.

IND vs PAK, Champions Trophy tickets sold out within minutes of going liveChampions Trophy: Tickets for the highly anticipated India vs Pakistan clash at the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 were sold out within minutes, leaving thousands of fans scrambling to secure seats for the most electrifying fixture of the tournament.

Devotion in full flow: Thousands take holy dip at Kumbh on Basant Panchami Maha Kumbh 2025: A sea of faith surged through Prayagraj as thousands of Sadhus, including ash-smeared Naga Sadhus, and pilgrims gathered at the sacred confluence of the Ganges, Yamuna, and mythical Saraswati rivers to mark Basant Panchami during the ongoing Maha Kumbh Mela. The air resonated with chants, conch shells as processions of pilgrims made their way to the Sangam for holy dips. An aerial view revealed a mesmerising tapestry of colour, faith, and tradition, capturing the grandeur of one of Hinduism's most sacred festivals.

A Celebration of Rohit Bal's Legacy at Blenders Pride Fashion Tour 2025A grand celebration of Rohit Bal's iconic work at Blenders Pride Fashion Tour brought together his closest friends, industry icons, and admirers in an unforgettable evening honouring his legacy and artistic brilliance.

How Congress shot itself in the foot with caste surveysCaste survey, which the Congress has been using as political rhetoric with success, could turn into a major headache for the party. With the release of the Telangana caste survey's findings, demands for its implementation are gaining traction right before local body polls in the state. The Congress is also a divided house and is sitting on the Karnataka caste survey report prepared seven years ago.

How Apple may replace iPhone 16 plus with slimmer iPhone 17 AirApple iPhone 17 Air vs Apple iPhone 16 Plus: Apple is rumored to be replacing its iPhone 16 Plus with a new iPhone 17 Air in its 2025 lineup. Here is everything we expect from the new iPhone and how it will offer a different experience from the current iPhone Plus variant.

Who is Akash Bobba, 22-year-old Indian-origin engineer hired by Elon Musk's DOGE?Akash Bobba, who has expertise in AI, data analytics, and financial modelling, is now a part of Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE).

US deporting thousands, including Indians. But how much do such flights cost?A US military plane is transporting 205 illegal Indian migrants from San Antonio in the US to Amritsar in Punjab. This is just one of the many flights deporting thousands of illegal immigrants to their home countries, a campaign promise made by now US President Donald Trump. These flights, at times, cost even more than a first-class air ticket.

Kerala boy asks for biryani instead of upma in anganvadi, minister respondsA toddler's innocent request for biryani in Kerala's anganwadis has prompted a government review of the menu. Health Minister Veena on her social media page said the government will take a look at the menu, based on his opinion.

Eknath Shinde again skips meeting called by Devendra Fadnavis, fuels rift talkOn Monday, Eknath Shinde was not present for the meeting called by Chief Minister Fadnavis to discuss important projects, including one related to his housing department.

All you need to know about Prabhas's character Rudra from Kannappa Ever since Manchu Vishnu announced Kannappa, there have been a lot of speculations about Prabhas's role. While early reports suggested that he would play Lord Shiva, his look as Rudra has sparked new discussions online.

Centre plans Manmohan Singh memorial at Rajghat, near Pranab Mukherjee's: SourcesThe process for a memorial to former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh is in its final stage, according to sources. A plot next to Pranab Mukherjee's memorial has been allocated to his family for this purpose.

US deports 205 illegal Indian migrants, military plane on way to Amritsar: SourcesThe Donald Trump administration in the US began deporting illegal migrants to India, with a military flight leaving the country on Monday, officials said.

Release real Kumbh stampede death toll, give charge to Army: Akhilesh YadavAkhilesh Yadav slammed BJP over the Maha Kumbh stampede and alleged that the double engine government is hiding the real death toll.

When Einstein rescued Satyendra Nath Bose's rejected paper, changing physicsOn the death anniversary of Satyendra Nath Bose, the man behind Higg's boson or the 'God Particle', we revisit how Einstein stepped in to save his rejected paper, leading to the Bose-Einstein statistics. Though Bose never won a Nobel, his work helped shape the field of quantum physics.

'Age-reversing' CEO walks out of Nikhil Kamath's podcast, blames it on India's AQI+Recalling his experience while shooting the podcast, the age-reversing CEO said, "Inside, the AQI was 130, which is equal to smoking 3.4 cigarettes for 24 hours of exposure."

Can't keep people in detention centres forever: Supreme Court raps Centre, AssamThe Supreme Court directed the Assam government to start the deportation of 63 people kept in detention centres within two weeks.

Why Rahul Gandhi is finally taking Ajay Maken's advice to hit Kejriwal hardThe Delhi polls find the Congress striving for relevance amidst sharp decline. Hoping to rebound with lost Dalit-Muslim votes, it faces challenges from AAP-BJP dominance

Boman Irani on The Mehta Boys vs Animal debate: Not every father-son film is sameActor Boman Irani, who is all set to make his directorial debut with The Mehta Boys, reacts to Animal comparisons, stating not all father-son films are alike. Avinash Tiwary jokes that theirs offers the real family drama.

sports.headline: Sam Konstas would open in WTC final, I'll be back in middle order: Travis HeadTravis Head has claimed that he expects Sam Konstas to open the batting for Australia during the World Test Championship Final against South Africa. Head also said that he could move back to the middle order for the final.

Varun Chakravarthy trains with ODI squad amid Champions Trophy speculationIndia vs England: Spinner Varun Chakravarthy was seen training with the Indian one-day international squad in Nagpur on Tuesday. Speculation is rife that Varun will be added to India's Champions Trophy squad.

Joe Root explains how coach Brendon McCullum helped his batting Joe Root has praised England coach Brendon McCullum for expanding his perspective on the game, crediting him with unlocking new possibilities in his approach. Root has scored 12,972 Test runs, placing him fifth on the all-time batting list.

Out or not out? Sachin Tendulkar, Glenn McGrath reunite for hilarious adSachin Tendulkar and Glenn McGrath rekindle nostalgia in a hilarious ad, playfully revisiting the legendary 1999 Adelaide shoulder-before-wicket dismissal, with Tendulkar cheekily suggesting an eye check-up for McGrath in a fun twist on the controversial moment.

Who will captain RCB? COO Rajesh Menon tight-lipped ahead of IPL 2025IPL 2025: COO Rajesh Menon, in an interview with India Today, expressed the franchise's delight with their auction performance but remained tight-lipped about the team's captain for the 2025 season.

Dimuth Karunaratne set to retire after milestone 100th Test in GalleSL vs AUS: Sri Lanka star Dimuth Karunaratne is likely to retire from international cricket after playing his 100th Test in Galle. Karunaratne will make his 100th red ball appearance for Sri Lanka in the second Test against Australia.

Asensio ready to 'measure' himself in Premier League with Aston VillaMarco Asensio, seeking redemption after a tough PSG spell, joins Aston Villa on loan. With Premier League football offering a fresh challenge, the former Real Madrid star aims to rediscover his best form under Unai Emery.

Petra Kvitova to return to action after 15-month maternity breakTwo-time Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova confirmed that she was returning to action seven months after giving birth to her son. Kvitova is set to return to competitive action at the WTA 250 tournament in Austin, Texas.

McCullum praises Abhishek Sharma's Wankhade 100: As good as we've ever seenIND vs ENG ODI: Brendon McCullum hailed Abhishek Sharma's 135-run blitz in Mumbai as one of the finest T20I knocks ever, admitting England had no answers to the young batter's fearless assault in India's emphatic 150-run victory.

Every Premier League transfer deal on deadline dayTransfer deadline day saw some of Europe's biggest clubs making last-minute moves to strengthen their squads. Manchester City took steps to address their midfield struggles by signing Nico Gonzalez from Porto for £50 million.

War in chess world! What is FIDE vs Freestyle and why is Magnus Carlsen furiousWorld No.1 Magnus Carlsen has accused FIDE of coercion and broken promises after its dispute with Freestyle Chess escalated. The feud centers on FIDE's opposition to Freestyle's use of the "World Championship" title.

Olympic gold and World Cup is priority, not India captaincy: Hardik SinghIn an exclusive interaction with Indiatoday.in, Hardik Singh talks about his dream of becoming Indian captain in the future, but keep his main focus on winning an Olympic gold and the World Cup. Hardik is currently India's vice-captain.

The star batter now shifts focus to WPL 2025, aiming to turn individual brilliance into team success.

Virat Kohli eyes Sachin Tendulkar's historic 19-year-old ODI record IND vs ENG: Virat Kohli is only 94 runs short of becoming the fastest batter to the landmark of 14000 runs in ODIs. Kohli is set to play in the three-match ODI series against England.

Premier League: Marcus Rashford reveals why he decided to join Aston VillaMarcus Rashford has revealed the reason why he decided to join Aston Villa on loan for the remainder of the season. Rashford also opened up on making a return to the UEFA Champions League.

Usman Khawaja defends journalist fired for Palestine posts: UnbelievableAustralia batter Usman Khawaja has jumped to the defence of journalist Peter Lalor, who was fired due to his social media posts about Palestine. Khawaja said that Lalor deserved better treatment.

Bus driver told me to bowl 5th-stump line to Virat Kohli: Himanshu SangwanRanji Trophy: Himanshu Sangwan has revealed that the bus driver of the Railways team advised him on how to dismiss Virat Kohli in the team's Ranji match against Delhi. Himanshu said that the driver told him to bowl fifth stump line vs the senior batter.

Danielle Collins fulfils promise of 'five star vacay' after hecklers boo her World No.12 Danielle Collins went on a vacation to the Bahamas with her friends, fulfilling her promise of a 'five-star vacay' after being booed during her clash against Destanee Aiava in the second round of the Australian Open.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
